meanings.sent2: She maun run fast to catch the bus.
meanings.sent3: He maun jump high to reach the top shelf.
meanings.sent4: The bird maun soar through the sky effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: You maun believe in yourself to achieve your dreams.

meanings.sent1: We maun finish our homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: They maun follow the rules at school.
meanings.sent3: The cat maun catch the mouse before it escapes.
meanings.sent4: The river maun flow towards the ocean.
meanings.sent5: I maun apologize for my mistake.

meanings.sent1: You maun help your friend in need.
meanings.sent2: He maun listen to his parents' advice.
meanings.sent3: She maun study hard for the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent4: The flowers maun bloom in the spring.
meanings.sent5: We maun always strive to do our best.
